sentences.sContent: Their factory had to close down for good.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their factory had to close down for good.
sentences.sCn: 他们的工厂只好永远关闭。

sentences.sContent: All but one of those reactors are due to close down by 2023.
sentences.sContent_eng: All but one of those reactors are due to close down by 2023.
sentences.sCn: 所有的反应堆除了一个以外其他的都计划在2023 年之前关闭。
